DOC.detailed_description: We successfully establish ovarian cancer cell line ( OVTW-59 ) , derive ovarian endometrioid carcinoma . Its sublines , label P0 , P1 , P2 , P3 , P4 increase invasion ability , select transwell invasion chamber , P0 represent original cell line 100th passage . By use cDNA microarray verify quantitative reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction , identify differentially gene expression profile OVTW-59 series cell line order identify invasion relate suppressor oncogene ovarian carcinoma . From gene , select insulin-like growth factor bind protein ( IGFBP ) -3 , suppressor gene , find low express higher-grade tumor correlate poor patient survival . In vitro , find IGFBP-3 related inhibition cancer cell migration . We would study change cytoskeletal structure know function anti-proliferation apoptosis IGFBP-3 .
